trigger.name: 3h with No data from IPMI interface

trigger.expression: {IPMI HP DL360p Gen9:Fan1.last()}=0 or {IPMI HP DL360p Gen9:Fan2.last()}=0 or {IPMI HP DL360p Gen9:Fan3.last()}=0 or {IPMI HP DL360p Gen9:Fan4.last()}=0 or {IPMI HP DL360p Gen9:Fan5.last()}=0 or {IPMI HP DL360p Gen9:Fan6.last()}=0 or {IPMI HP DL360p Gen9:Fan7.last()}=0
trigger.name: Error FANS

trigger.expression: {IPMI HP DL360p Gen9:PowerSupply1.last()}=0 or {IPMI HP DL360p Gen9:PowerSupply2.last()}=0
trigger.name: Error Power

trigger.expression: {IPMI HP DL360p Gen9:02-CPU1.last()}>70 or {IPMI HP DL360p Gen9:03-CPU2.last()}>70
trigger.name: Error Temp CPU
